trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>evento si verifica quando un pannello smart tag viene visualizzato o nascosto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento non viene generato direttamente dal pannello, ma piuttosto dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>quando viene chiamato il relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metodi vengono eseguiti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento, il `relatedObject` parametro fa sempre riferimento al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>che è associato il pannello.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che è associato al pannello.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che specifica se il pannello viene visualizzato o nascosto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un flag che indica se il pannello smart tag viene visualizzato o nascosto.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Se il pannello viene nascosto mediante una chiamata al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metodo, questa proprietà ha un valore di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Se viene visualizzato il pannello mediante una chiamata a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, questa proprietà ha un valore di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"> </xref> che indica lo stato del pannello.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che è associato il pannello smart tag.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RelatedObject fa consente al programmatore di associare un oggetto a un'istanza di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto è quindi disponibile per i metodi che gestiscono il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>associata con il pannello smart tag.</xref:System.Object>
